compiler: : Brandon W. Hawk, Rhode Island College

bibliography_entries.line_html: Gijsel lists 290 manuscripts in his critical edition (CCSA 9), plus another 7 in “Nouveaux témoins”; Hawk identifies a further manuscript in “New Witness.” For each textual family, I list the earliest witnesses with Gijsel’s sigla.
